sourcesContent:
Create your CV!!!

  • {{experience.title}}
  • {{experience.place}}
  • {{experience.startDate | date: 'dd/MM/yyyy'}}----{{experience.endDate | date: 'dd/MM/yyyy'}}
  • {{experience.description}}
import { Component, EventEmitter, Input, Output } from '@angular/core'; import { FormService } from 'src/app/form.service'; import { Experience } from 'src/app/models/experince'; import { Formulaire } from 'src/app/models/formulaire'; @Component({ selector: 'app-form', templateUrl: './form.component.html', styleUrls: ['./form.component.css'] }) export class FormComponent { @Input() personne: Formulaire[] = []; experiences: Experience[] = [{ title: 'PFE', place: 'Société Générale', startDate: new Date('December 17, 2020'), endDate: new Date('December 17, 2022'), description: 'Développement d’une application web pour la gestion des incidents informatiques.' }, { title: 'PFE', place: 'Société Générale', startDate: new Date('December 17, 2020'), endDate: new Date('December 17, 2022'), description: 'Développement d’une application web pour la gestion des incidents informatiques.' }]; constructor( private formServ: FormService ) { } ngOnInit() { } onSubmit(form: any) { console.log(form.value); this.formServ.addFormulaire(form.value); form.reset(); } addExperience() { } }
